description: Building responsive, modern web applications for clients using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. Specializing in creating intuitive user interfaces and seamless user experiences.
Provided comprehensive virtual assistance including email management, chat support, and basic Shopify store customization. Handled customer inquiries and maintained efficient communication workflows.
Developed and maintained responsive websites, implemented UI components, and collaborated with senior developers on various client projects. Gained hands-on experience with modern web technologies.
